sentences.en: A belt carcass includes a net - shaped inner layer and two outer layers.
sentences.cn: 一种带体,包含一网状的内层与二外层.

sentences.en: A butcher chops up a pig carcass on a block . Mr.
sentences.cn: 一名肉类柜台营业员正在砧板上斩开猪肉.

sentences.en: A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentences.cn: 一群秃鹫蹲伏在一具野牛的尸体上。

sentences.en: Auxiliary machine: carcass servicer, belt servicer and tread servicer.
sentences.cn: 辅机部分: 胎体供料装置 、 带束层供料装置、胎面供料装置.

sentences.en: Characteristics of different pathological appearances of the pork carcass skin are detailed.
sentences.cn: 本文详细介绍了猪胴体皮肤病变的种类和相应的特征.

sentences.en: Chop duck carcass into pieces and slightly brown in a preheated oven.
sentences.cn: 把鸭壳斩件铺在焗盘,再放入焗炉烤熟至微黄.

sentences.en: The entire carcass, hide, guts and bones, will quickly be devoured.
sentences.cn: 整个动物尸体, 包括皮 、 内脏和骨, 很快便会被吞噬.

sentences.en: The hunter knelt beside the animal carcass and commenced to skin it.
sentences.cn: 猎人跪在动物尸体旁边，开始剥皮。

sentences.en: They divided the deer's carcass, the hunter taking the hinder parts.
sentences.cn: 他们将鹿的躯体一分为二, 猎手分得后面部分.

sentences.en: They found that these bone tools cut the carcass effectively.
sentences.cn: 他们发现这些骨质工具切割兽肉是挺好用的.

sentences.en: This process produces a natural mummy of the animal's carcass.
sentences.cn: 这种过程能产生动物尸体的自然状态的木乃伊.

sentences.en: Vultures flew around in the sky waiting to pick at the carcass of the deer.
sentences.cn: 秃鹰在天空盘旋等着啄食鹿的尸体.

sentences.en: We came across the carcass of a lion.
sentences.cn: 我们遇到了一具狮子的尸体.

sentences.en: You can render the chicken carcass down to make stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 你可把这只鸡炖烂,做成汤料.

sentences.en: You may find a bit of meat leave on the chicken carcass.
sentences.cn: 鸡骨头上还可能有点儿肉呢.

words.tran_cn: （人或动物的）尸体；残骸；（除脏去头备食用的）畜体

trans.tran_cn: （人或动物的）尸体，（家畜屠宰后的）躯体，骨架，遗骸、残迹等
trans.tran_en: the body of a dead animal
